name: Nihileth
description: The Nihileth is a large undead creature with a ghostly form and a significant challenge rating of 13. It features a sludgy, translucent appearance when infected and maintains a haunting presence that spreads disease.
memorable: It can infect others with Nihilethic Rot, potentially transforming them into undead under its control.
goals: To spread the debilitating disease Nihilethic Rot and control its infected victims.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other undead or creatures affected by its disease.
environment: Typically found in dark places or areas tainted by necrotic energy.
strengths: High hit points, multiple damage immunities, and the ability to switch between forms.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity score indicates slowness and vulnerability to radiant damage.
attacks: Can perform multiple Tentacle and Tail attacks, dealing bludgeoning damage and potentially inflicting disease.
most_powerful_ability: Infecting Telepathy allows it to spread Nihilethic Rot disease to creatures telepathically communicating with it.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 20, indicating keen awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in History and Perception, with significant bonuses to both.
additional_information: Immunities to cold, necrotic, and poison damage.
Can move through creatures and objects in Void Ghost form.
Undead Fortitude allows it to remain standing after lethal damage.
Void Aura halves the speed and deals cold damage to nearby infected creatures.
Transformative ability to switch forms as a bonus action.
test_queries: chaotic evil undead with disease powers
creature that can infect others telepathically
undead that transforms into a void ghost
